name: sig/essential-components
title: Taskip: Essential Components
description: Display essential components for professional quotations

mainTitle.default: Essential Components Every Professional Quotation Must Include

leadText.default: Creating a comprehensive quotation requires attention to detail and inclusion of all necessary elements. Every professional business quotation should include these critical components to ensure clarity, prevent disputes, and maintain legal compliance.

default.title: Unique Quotation Number
default.description: A sequential identifier for tracking, reference, and record-keeping purposes. This helps both parties refer to specific quotes in future communications. Format example: QT-2024-001

default.title: Issue Date & Validity Period
default.description: Clearly state when the quote was created and how long the offer remains valid (typically 30-90 days). This creates urgency and protects against price fluctuations.

default.title: Complete Business Information
default.description: Your company name, registered address, contact details, tax registration numbers (GST/VAT), and business license numbers where applicable.

default.title: Detailed Client Information
default.description: Customer's full name, company name, billing address, shipping address (if different), contact person, phone number, and email address.

default.title: Comprehensive Item Description
default.description: Detailed list of products or services including specifications, model numbers, quantities, unit prices, and line totals. Include images where helpful.

default.title: Transparent Pricing Breakdown
default.description: Subtotal, applicable taxes (itemized), shipping costs, handling fees, discounts applied, and the final total amount in clear currency denomination.

default.title: Payment Terms & Conditions
default.description: Accepted payment methods, payment schedule (if applicable), late payment penalties, and refund/cancellation policies.

default.title: Delivery Information
default.description: Expected delivery dates, shipping methods, installation requirements, and any dependencies or prerequisites.

default.title: Warranty & Support Details
default.description: Product warranties, service guarantees, support terms, and maintenance agreements if applicable.

default.title: Authorized Signature
default.description: Physical or digital signature of an authorized representative to validate the quotation's authenticity and commitment.
